main event: A white light that flashed on and off, similar to a commercial aircraft, was sighted from the control tower of the Naval Air Station in Lakehurst, NJ. The object made a tight circular turn and disappeared at high speed.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be at an altitude of 5,000 feet.
The object was observed for approximately 45 seconds.
The observers were experienced tower operators and were considered reliable.
The weather conditions at the time were clear with good visibility.
The sighting was reported to the District Intelligence Office of the Fourth Naval District and the USAF OSI.
sighted object: a white light that flashed on and off, circular or oval in shape
